sentences.en: a note with subtle variances of pitch
sentences.cn: 音高有细微变化的音符

sentences.en: He believes many "psychics" are frauds who rely on perception and subtle deception.
sentences.cn: 他认为许多“通灵者”都是骗子，他们都是靠直觉和巧妙的骗术蒙人。

sentences.en: He is a subtle character, you know.
Her methods of seduction are subtle.
sentences.cn: 她勾引人的手段很巧妙。

sentences.en: Her whole attitude had undergone a subtle change.
sentences.cn: 她的整个态度发生了微妙的变化.

sentences.en: Herbs have been used for centuries to endow a whole range of foods with subtle flavours.
sentences.cn: 数个世纪以来，香草一直被用于给各种食物增添淡淡的香味。

sentences.en: I even began to exploit him in subtle ways.
sentences.cn: 我甚至开始巧妙地利用他。

sentences.en: It is a strange smile. It lacks the subtle nuances of an ordinary smile.
sentences.cn: 那笑容奇怪. 它缺少一般笑容所含的细腻韵味.

sentences.en: Some of the designs are subtle, some gloriously OTT.
sentences.cn: 有些设计含蓄精妙，有些夸张绚丽。

sentences.en: The dish had a subtle hint of ginger.
sentences.cn: 这道菜微微带点姜的味道。

sentences.en: The pictures are similar, but there are subtle differences between them.
sentences.cn: 这些图片很相似，但它们之间有细微的差别。

sentences.en: The public areas offer a subtle blend of traditional charm with modern amenities.
sentences.cn: 这些公共场所将传统魅力和现代设施巧妙地融合在了一起。

sentences.en: The tactics employed can range from overt bullying to subtle emotional blackmail.
sentences.cn: 从公然威吓到微妙的情感胁迫，各种战术都用上了。

sentences.en: The warning signs of the disease are so subtle that they are often ignored.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病的警示征兆不易察觉，因而往往被忽视。

sentences.en: Their language is particularly difficult to learn because of its subtle shading of tone and emphasis.
sentences.cn: 他们的语言因为音调和重音上的细微变化而特别难学。

sentences.en: There's a subtle hint of garlic in the sauce.
sentences.cn: 调味汁里稍微有一点蒜味.

sentences.en: We can use our eyes and facial expressions to communicate virtually every subtle nuance of emotion there is.
sentences.cn: 我们用眼睛和面部表情几乎就能传达出情感上的每一丝微妙变化。

sentences.en: Young haricot beans have a tender texture and a delicate, subtle flavour.
sentences.cn: 嫩菜豆口感细腻，味道清香、淡雅。

trans.tran_cn: 微妙的，敏感的，狡猾的，巧妙的
trans.tran_en: not easy to notice or understand unless you pay careful attention
